text: The source that the geometry will be imported from.

The geometry will be imported from the target SOP node, evaluated at
        the frame associated with the upstream work item. If the

parameter is enabled, the SOP will instead be evaluated at the
        time specified in that parameter.

The geometry will be read from the result file produced by the 
        upstream work item.

The geometry will be loaded from the upstream work item’s in-memory
        geometry representation.

The data tag used to select the result from the upstream work item.
